Name: Six Aspects
About the game: Six Aspects may be the first Same Time Strategy (STS) game melding the tactical nature of turn based systems with the challenging demand of real time strategy. This unique feature makes it highly accessible. Leverage the aspects of earth, fire, wind, water, lightning, and ice to re-take your rightful home in a fantasy world. Enjoy the strategic depth as different terrain types won't just shape the backgrounds but the very battles they are fought on! Play your way! Command 6 squads made up of up to 7 troops to strategically control each stage. Initial release will include 13 stages. Expand your forces with 24 classes by using the unique duplicate system so that you'll never start a character at level one again!
Meta Title: Six Aspects: Apr 22, 2022, Charles Zammit and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Six Aspects? Check out the release date (Apr 22, 2022), developer insights from Charles Zammit, and a complete game summary.
